name: Last Moment
description:
An ambitious, genre-defying game about a girl whose wish came true in the worst possible way.

Credits

Art 

  • adapted work by Zoltan Kosina licensed under the Unlicense based on 
    • PIPOYA FREE RPG Character Sprites 32x32 and PIPOYA FREE RPG TILESET 32x32 Pixel by pipoya.
  • RPG Maker MV RTP Shoulder-Up Portraits by Caz and KADOKAWA. You must adhere to KADOKAWA's terms of use!

Fonts

  • Rothenburg Decorative by Typographer Mediengestaltung

Audio

  • A Moment Forever – caring, loving and sincere dreamy music with harp melody, warm pads and piano by ZapSplat from https://www.zapsplat.com licensed under the Standard License (4. Games and apps)
